summary: Cannonman tells the story of Dafyd, a downtrodden circus performer trying desperately to break free from the shackles of his tyrannical bearded wife.

title: CATCHING THE TIDE.

title: DIFFICULT CASE, a.

title: KERRY'S STORY.
credits_note: Director, d.  Christine Winford ; Producer,  Cormorant Films.

title: MAGIC MOMENTS.
credits_note: Director, d.  Saul Metzstein ; Producer,  Out to Lunch.

summary: It's Saturday night. Downstairs are having a party and you weren't invited. Time for another smashing night in. [synopsis from BFI database at http://ftvdb.bfi.org.uk/sift/title/598565, last accessed 4/12/2008]

title: LEONARD.

summary: Music video produced for '4 Minute Wonders' scheme, featuring the track 'Raindance' by Light Sleepers.  "No Time, No Space, No Body, No Where" - a cool, laid back muse on time.

subjects: music video

title: [MAGIC K].

summary: Music video produced for '4 Minute Wonders' scheme, featuring the track 'Magic K' by Master H.  A 'cardboard box man' makes his way around town to a funky beat.  Soon he finds some boxes in a warehouse and creates a friend!  But it all ends in tears when

title: [BACK TO THE TOP].

summary: Music video produced for '4 Minute Wonders' scheme, featuring the track 'Back to the Top' by Open Door.  Whirling around on the waltzers to an upbeat tune.

title: [ON THE LINE].

title: [STAND UP].

title: JAH.
subjects: music video
summary: Music video produced for '4 Minute Wonders' scheme, featuring the track 'Jah' by Akai Krush Crew.   A smart gathering of Edinburgh folk come to view a black-and-white Bollywood song-and-dance.  [synopsis by Angus Wolfe Murray, from Eye for Film website ht

credits_note: Director, d.  Julian Kean ; Producer,  KCD Films.

summary: Melanie, 34, knows she will die within 10 years due to autoimmune disease.  Having survived a near fatal operation, Melanie escaped the stresses of city life to search for her ideal home for the time she has left - but it's not as easy as that.

title: EYES ON THE STREET.
subjects: comedy
summary: A documentary team explores the strange world of community wardens.

title: NEW FUNK THEORY.
subjects: music video

title: DEEP HIT OF MORNING SUN.

title: YOU'RE MY FAVOURITE MUSIC.
subjects: music video

title: [STAY (IN THE HONEY TREE)].
subjects: music video

title: [WILD CHILLIES]  .

title: [NIGHT MOVES].
subjects: music video
summary: Music video produced for '4 Minute Wonders' scheme, featuring the track 'Night Moves' by Envoy.  A man runs through an animated cityscape trying to escape his destiny.... because at the stroke of midnight he will turn into a werewolf!

title: [JILL'S WEDDING].
